headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Land Races
content:
So, you’ve built yourself a fine-tuned ride with all sorts of bells and whistles; all that’s left is to test it against some flesh-and-blood competition: whip around the track, use your muscle to force your foes into a hard shoulder, and make your way across the finish line however you see fit.

All Land Races are doling out Triple Rewards through October 6, so it’ll be worth your while whatever the outcome.
